entities.name: riddikulus
entities.description: The spell that Neville used to defeat the boggart ("Riddikulus! he shouted").

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape appeared in his lacy dress as a boggart ("they had a split second’s view of Snape in his lacy dress").

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville was the one who successfully defeated the boggart with the spell Riddikulus ("Excellent! cried Professor Lupin as the class broke into applause. Excellent, Neville.").

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor house received points for every person who tackled the boggart ("ﬁve points to Gryﬀindor for every person to tackle the boggart").

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione received points for answering Professor Lupin’s questions correctly at the start of the class ("Very well, you and Hermione answered my questions correctly at the start of the class").

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry received points for answering Professor Lupin’s questions correctly at the start of the class ("Very well, you and Hermione answered my questions correctly at the start of the class").

relationships.description: Neville successfully defeated the boggart with the spell Riddikulus ("Excellent! cried Professor Lupin as the class broke into applause. Excellent, Neville.").
